    • instance

      public static MouseListener instance
      The mouse listener instance.

  • Method Details

    • mousePosCallback

      public static void mousePosCallback​(long window, double x, double y)
      Checks if the mouse position has changed.
      Parameters:
      window - The current game window.
      x - The current x-position of the mouse.
      y - The current y-position of the mouse.

    • mouseButtonCallback

      public static void mouseButtonCallback​(long window, int button, int action, int mods)
      Checks if a mouse button state has changed.
      Parameters:
      window - The current game window.
      button - The mouse button (0 = left, 1 = right, 2 = middle).
      action - The type of action that's occurring (press, release, ...).
      mods - The code of any modifier (if any).

    • mouseScrollCallback

      public static void mouseScrollCallback​(long window, double xOffset, double yOffset)
      Checks if a mouse scroll state has changed.
      Parameters:
      window - The current game window.
      xOffset - The scroll-x value.
      yOffset - The scroll-y value.

    • endFrame

      public static void endFrame()
      Resets the mouse properties

      Returns:
      The mouse listener.

      Returns:

      public static float getLastX()
      Returns:

      public static float getLastY()
      Returns:
      The last y-position of the mouse.

    • getDX

      public static float getDX()
      Returns:
      The change in x-position of the mouse.

    • getDY

      public static float getDY()
      Returns:
      The change in y-position of the mouse.

    • getScrollX

      Returns:
      The scroll-x value.

      public static float getScrollY()
      Returns:
      The scroll-y value.

    • mouseButtonDown

      public static boolean mouseButtonDown​(int button)
      Parameters:
      button - The mouse button to be checked (0 = left, 1 = right, 2 = middle).
      Returns:
      whether a mouse button is down or not.

    • isDragging

      public static boolean isDragging()
      Returns:
      Whether the mouse is dragging or not.
